q1.question: How do we work together in the development process?
q1.answer: Our process includes initial consultations to understand your needs, design and iterative development with your constant feedback, thorough testing, and finally, implementation on your server or web hosting.

q2.question: Can you maintain and update my website after delivery?
q2.answer: Yes, we offer website maintenance and update services to ensure your site is always running optimally and updated with the latest technologies.

q3.question: Can you help me migrate my current website to a new platform?
q3.answer: Yes, we offer website migration services, allowing you to switch to a more modern and customized platform without losing data or functionality.

q4.question: How do you handle technical issues or interruptions on the website after launch?
q4.answer: We provide continuous technical support and promptly resolve issues. We also implement constant monitoring to prevent problems before they occur.
